titleStmt.title: The Iesuits undermining of parliaments and Protestants with their foolish phancy of a toleration, discovered, and censured. Written by William Castle, for the confirmation of wavering Protestants, and the reducing of seduced papists.
titleStmt.author: Castell, William, d. 1645.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. G. for Joseph Hunscot,
